Text: DUDE... siriuslee? come on man, why would ANYONE have English subs built into an English speaking movie!?  waste of fucking time, whoever encoded this is a fucking moron

Lol @ comment above me. Please keep in mind that not all people are native English. Plus they're embedded into the matroska file, so you can keep em off >.< Complaining about nothing.
A better comment would have been:
"Thanks, I enjoyed the movie and I'll make sure to buy my copy"
WOULD YOU PEOPLE PLEASE KILL THE FUCKIN MKV FILES??? SOME OF US WANT TO WATCH THESE MOVIES ON OUR TV! SMH

@KotsChopShop:
Some people are hard of hearing and appreciate English subtitles included with an English language movie.  But you had to be a jerk about it so now you can eat crow.
